price: Яратган Зот Ўзи билмасми? Ҳолбуки, У Меҳрибон ва Хабардор Зотдир.
arabic: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alā yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
